description:
Do you believe in love at first sight? You will the minute you set foot in this Bowral beauty. This stunning new build which is now 4 years young, was successfully built to fit sympathetically into the old Bowral surrounds. Designed by local architect & master built, this home provides all the modern conveniences & comforts with light-filled interiors & quality finishes that premium buyers crave.

It will be hard to pinpoint what you love the most – wait until you discover what is on the lower level! - however there's no denying the outlook to Mt Oxley at the side & Mt Gibraltar at the rear is nothing short of spectacular. Ultimately though, the essence of what this home delivers, is a truly beautiful family haven that is sure to capture your heart.

- Living areas are spacious & welcoming, & along with the kitchen & dining zone showcase blissful views to Mt Oxley & Mt Gilbraltar
- Beautiful grey ironbark flooring, 9" ceilings, heritage style sash windows & elegant appointments
- Gorgeous kitchen features a twin farmhouse sink, premium appliances, jarrah island bench top
- Large master bedroom adjoins a walk-in robe and chic ensuite and extends to the front veranda
- Three further bedrooms with built-ins, one opening to the front veranda, & another with views to Mt Oxley
- Stunning bathrooms, a clawfoot tub in the main & twin shower in the ensuite, notable highlights
- 7-car garage is a car lover's dream or perhaps the perfect space to run a home business or convert to further accommodation, the possibilities are endless
- Adjoining workshop (or mancave!) is a further fantastic bonus
- Farmhouse style doors at the rear of the garage open out to a large covered outdoor area, perfect for large scale entertaining
- Ducted heating/cooling, heated bathroom floors, a wood fire & lovely sunshine provide year-round comfort
- Enormous and completely level backyard, framed in trees & providing a safe haven for children

Offering a walk-to town position & a lifestyle that is beyond compare, this exquisite home will spoil you for anything else.

Contact Ben Olofsen on 0419 019 423 or Lindsey Harris on 0499 554 738

Disclaimer: While we make every effort to ensure that the information we provide you is correct and up-to-date, we do not warrant its accuracy or reliability. Interested parties should exercise their own independent skill & judgement before they rely on it. In any important matter, you should seek professional advice relevant to your own circumstances.
